title: Dr. ER
description:
From the New York Times & USA Today bestselling author of TAPPING THE BILLIONAIRE comes a new three book series of Romantic Comedy standalones.Dr. Erotic.That’s what they’ve decided to call me, Scott Shepard, the head of St. Luke’s Hospital Emergency Department. Just thinking about it makes me smile. As the new face of the reality docuseries, The Doctor Is In, I plan to take his power and recognition right to the streets of New York City and into the pants of willing women. Well, that was my plan. Until her—feisty, beautiful, and addictively sexy Harlow Paige. A gossip columnist that just loves writing about yours truly, she’s everything I thought I never wanted and then some. She drives me crazy.Problem is, she doesn’t want to be anything when it comes to me—not friends, not lovers, not even adversaries.God, I love a good challenge.
Get ready, Harlow. Love is contagious.
author: Max Monroe
